parameters.name: options
parameters.description: JSON stringified array of FindOptionDto, e.g. [{"name":"color","values":["red","blue"]}]

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: JSON stringified array of FindOptionDto, e.g. [{"name":"color","values":["red","blue"]}]

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: placed, in_progress, ready_for_delivery, out_for_delivery, delivered, cancelled

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: placed, in_progress, ready_for_delivery, out_for_delivery, delivered, cancelled

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of conversation to find

parameters.name: postedById
parameters.description: The ID of the user who posted the post, can be used to get a specific user posts

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The ID of the product tagged in the post, can be used to get posts that belong to a specific product (appears in)

parameters.name: taggedUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user tagged in the post, can be used to get posts that have a specific tagged user in them

parameters.name: postedById
parameters.description: The ID of the user who posted the story, can be used to get a specific user stories

attributeName.description: The name of the attribute. (e.g. color, size, etc.)

attributeValue.description: The value of the attribute. (e.g. red, large, etc.)

status.description: placed, in_progress, ready_for_delivery, out_for_delivery, delivered, cancelled

productIds.description: If this is provided, the promotion will be applied to all products in the array, even if they are not inside categoryIds or subCategoryIds

categoryIds.description: If this is provided, the promotion will be applied to all products in the Category, even if they are not inside productIds

subCategoryIds.description: If this is provided, the promotion will be applied to all products in the subcategories, even if they are not inside categoryIds or productIds

subCategories.description: The sub-categories of the category, if this category has sub-categories.

superCategoryId.description: The super category of the category, if this category is a sub-category of another category.
